data.title: Top video game music artists
data.meta_description: Browse the top video game music artists to find new music. Scrobble songs to get recommendations on tracks you'll love.
data.text:
Atlus Sound Team (アトラスサウンドチーム) is a collective of video game composers and musicians for the Japanese gaming company Atlus. Its members have…

HOYO-MiX is the in-house music studio of HoYoverse, responsible for the production of the company's original game music. They have produced music…

SEGA Sound Team is the collective name of musicians who produce soundtracks for the video game company Sega. They are sometimes credited for…

Capcom Sound Team is a collective name for the several teams of composers and musicians that work on soundtracks for video game developer…

Eric Barone (born December 3, 1987), known professionally as ConcernedApe, is an American game designer and musician. He is best known for…

祖堅正慶 (Masayoshi Soken) is a Japanese video game composer and sound editor who has worked for Square Enix since 2001. He is best known for…

Yasunori Mitsuda (光田 康典 Mitsuda Yasunori, born January 21, 1972) is a Japanese composer, sound designer, and musician. He is best known for his…

JT Music was previously known as J.T. Machinima before an acquisition by Rooster Teeth in 2018.

Koji Kondo (近藤 浩治 Kondō Kōji, born August 13, 1960) is a Japanese composer and musician best known for his scores for various video games…

TPR is Dan Collins, a British arranger best known for the 'Melancholy' series of piano-based tributes to classic video game soundtracks as well as…

Falcom Sound Team jdk is the music composition team of Nihon Falcom Corp. Most of Falcom's soundtrack releases credit this group instead of…

Masafumi Takada (高田雅史) is a Japanese game composer for Grasshopper Manufacture.

He was first widely renowned for his work on the eccentric…

Masashi Hamauzu (濱渦正志), born September 20, 1971 in Munich, Germany, is a video game music composer who has worked for Square Enix for nearly a…

Motoi Sakuraba (桜庭統, Sakuraba Motoi, born August 5, 1965) has composed music for various Japanese video games (such as Dark Souls and the Tales…

Qumu is a YouTuber who makes music, usually video game remixes and covers. Not much is known about them, but their YouTube channel has been in…

Daisuke Ishiwatari (石渡太輔, Ishiwatari Daisuke, born August 14, 1973 in Johannesburg, South Africa) is a Japanese-South African game developer and is…

Hitoshi Sakimoto (崎元仁, Sakimoto Hitoshi, born February 26, 1969, in Tokyo) is a video game music composer. He worked freelance beginning in 1990…

Heaven Pierce Her is a post-rock project made by Hakita, (also a developer of the Old-School-FPS game ULTRAKILL), with a few albums/EPs of an…

Tee Lopes is a creative mind, known predominantly as a video game composer, but also as a songwriter, singer, arranger, voice over artist, DJ and…
